fields.name: AdministratorConfiguration
fields.description: The administrator credentials to be used for the nodes in the control plane.

fields.name: AvailabilityZones
fields.description: The list of availability zones of the Network Cloud cluster to be used for the provisioning of nodes in the control plane. If not specified, all availability zones will be used.

fields.name: Count
fields.description: The number of virtual machines that use this configuration.

fields.name: VMSkuName
fields.description: The name of the VM SKU supplied during creation.
